capsules_submitted.utterance: So I've been looking into the history of Hogwarts and I found out that Filch has a bit of an... complicated relationship with the school. Apparently, he's been working there for decades, but his strict adherence to the rules can sometimes make him come across as a bit too harsh on students. But at the same time, it's hard not to admire his dedication to keeping the castle in order. I'm pretty sure that's why he's so well-liked by the staff, even if he doesn't always get along with everyone.
